channel.title: How to quote
channel.description:
This is pissing me off enough for me to write a guide on it.
[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,187909.msg1737796.html#msg1737796]This is a [b]true mager[/b].[/url]
Now kids, do you see why you don't want to be a [b]true mager[/b]? Here, this [b]true mager[/b] quoted something almost 6000px high to make a one line comment. [b]true mager[/b]s quote topics without regard to a person's sanity, or even worse, their middle finger. The average computer user would have to scroll their scroll wheel 5.5 times to get to his content, which was not all that informative. Think about how many people you could have flipped off, when instead you had to scroll that wheel 5.5 times!
[size=13pt]Well mister, how can I not be a [b]true mager[/b], you ask? Well, I'll tell you![/size]
[size=12pt][b]The first step to quoting is to eliminate all images.[/b][/size] As you can see, [b]true mager[/b] did not know this rule. He quoted four whole images! Shame on him. Shame. Change all [b][[b][/b]img][/b] and [b][[b][/b]/img][/b] tags to [b][img ]http://[/b] and [b][/img ][/b] by adding a space after the 'img' and before the ]. EDIT: You can also change it to [b][[[b][/b]b][[b][/b]/b]img][/b] and [b][[[b][/b]b][[b][/b]/b]/img][/b] tags, which nator suggested.
[b]WRONG[/b]: [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="xxlegitxx"][img]http://mitbsig.sneamia.net/[/img][/quote][/td][/tr][/table]
[b]RIGHT[/b]: [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="xxlegitxx"][img ]http://mitbsig.sneamia.net/[/img ][/quote][/td][/tr][/table]
[size=12pt][b]The second step is to eliminate nested quotes.[/b][/size] Unless it is absolutely necessary to have context, do not quote nested quotes.
Hmm... [b]WRONG[/b]! [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="xxlegitxx"][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=0.msg0#msg0 date=9999999999] I'm so leet. [/quote]
Dude, that's so true.[/quote]
Yea he is pretty leet.[/td][/tr][/table]
[b]This is CORRECT[/b]: [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="xxlegitxx"]Dude, that's so true.[/quote]
Yea, he is pretty leet.[/td][/tr][/table]
[size=12pt][b]The third step is to fix the white space.[/b][/size] Do not leave unnecessary white space between the begin quote and the quoted text, or between the quoted text and the end quote. Also, add a space between the end quote and your post.
[b]WRONG![/b] [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="xxlegitxx"]I <3 xxlegitxx.[/quote] Truth.[/td][/tr][/table]
[b]WRONG AGAIN![/b] [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="xxlegitxx"]I <3 xxlegitxx.[/quote] Truth.[/td][/tr][/table]
[b]FINALLY YOU GOT IT RIGHT, DIPSHIT![/b] [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="xxlegitxx"]I <3 xxlegitxx.[/quote]
Truth.[/td][/tr][/table]
[size=12pt][b]The fourth step is to use more quotes.[/b][/size] If you make a good point, but don't quote who you are responding to, you just wasted your time. Short quotes never hurt anybody, and it certainly helps avoid unnecessary flame wars based on a miscontrued post.
[b]WRONG![/b] [table][tr][td][/td][td]You're a retard.[/td][/tr][/table]
[b]RIGHT:[/b] [table][tr][td][/td][td][quote="true mager, post:54, topic:136412"]trying it on "str" lol[/quote]
You're a retard.[/td][/tr][/table]
[size=12pt][b]The fifth and final step to quoting is to stick a fork up your ass.[/b][/size] So I don't get banned, I won't provide an example, but just remember: Prongs end first!
EDIT: I can't count.

@nator123123 wrote:

I will think of a tutorial to do…

teh funnies?

That is immensely funny.

item.title: How to quote
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:38, topic:142820”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=195405.msg1757561#msg1757561 date=1189855296]
But first provide a screenshot of where it tells you how many days you have left.
[/quote]

I will not believe that.
How is it spyware?
Only if you were here, you would figure it isn’t spyware out RIGHT away.[/quote]

Ok then, if you choose to disregard the first line, don’t disregard the second.

Provide a screenshot.
[/quote]
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,195405.20.html

teh funnies?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:

[quote=“nator123123, post:18, topic:142883”]Hmm… all you have to do is press the small “Quote” button.

Or, change the title to “How to properly quote”[/quote]

he is saying how to quote and not annoy half the forums viewers

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Leader_of_the_Ghosts Leader of the Ghosts
item.description:
@Leader_of_the_Ghosts wrote:

Bobby:

THis is stupid. only complete idiots don’t do this. I guess its needed tho.

Well bobby, it is needed for people who can’t do this…But I also think you don’t really need to post this, because people who actually need this won’t look inside.

Read full topic

item.title: How to quote
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:9, topic:142883”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=195469.msg1754789#msg1754789 date=1189737782]
You guys are just asking for a gmod to come here and slap moderations on you guys.
[/quote]
Are we suppose to be cowering in fear?

[center] Yes.[/center][/quote]

ROFLFMAOO. That moderation was funny.

But yeah. I usually don’t do this, but then again, I usually don’t quote tons of lines of anything.

Read full topic

item.title: How to quote
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:5, topic:142883”] [[b][/b]img]http://mitbsig.sneamia.net/[/img]
I’m good at controlling tags =P[/quote]

Ahh, I remember someone mentioned that before. Though imo adding spaces is easier to do on the fly. But I’ll include it.

Read full topic

item.title: How to quote
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:1, topic:142883”]WRONG:
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=0.msg0#msg0 date=9999999999]

[/quote][/td][/tr][/table]

RIGHT:
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=0.msg0#msg0 date=9999999999]
[img]http://mitbsig.sneamia.net/[/img]
[/quote][/td][/tr][/table][/quote]
You can put that up to make it look neater =D
EDIT: Without the yellow, of course.
EDIT2: I just took off the spaces of the [img] tag.
Here’s how:

[[b][/b]img]http://mitbsig.sneamia.net/[/img]

I’m good at controlling tags =P

Read full topic

item.title: How to quote
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

This is pissing me off enough for me to write a guide on it.

This is a true mager.

Now kids, do you see why you don’t want to be a true mager?
Here, this true mager quoted something almost 6000px high to make a one line comment.
true magers quote topics without regard to a person’s sanity, or even worse, their middle finger.
The average computer user would have to scroll their scroll wheel 5.5 times to get to his content, which was not all that informative. Think about how many people you could have flipped off, when instead you had to scroll that wheel 5.5 times!

[size=13pt]Well mister, how can I not be a true mager, you ask?
Well, I’ll tell you![/size]

[size=12pt]The first step to quoting is to eliminate all images.[/size] As you can see, true mager did not know this rule. He quoted four whole images! Shame on him. Shame. Change all [img] and [/img] tags to [img ]http:// and [/img ] by adding a space after the ‘img’ and before the ]. EDIT: You can also change it to [[b][/b]img] and [[b][/b]/img] tags, which nator suggested.

WRONG:
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“xxlegitxx”][/quote][/td][/tr][/table]

RIGHT:
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“xxlegitxx”][img ]http://mitbsig.sneamia.net/[/img ][/quote][/td][/tr][/table]

[size=12pt]The second step is to eliminate nested quotes.[/size] Unless it is absolutely necessary to have context, do not quote nested quotes.

Hmm… WRONG!
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“xxlegitxx”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=0.msg0#msg0 date=9999999999]
I’m so leet.
[/quote]

Dude, that’s so true.[/quote]

Yea he is pretty leet.[/td][/tr][/table]

This is CORRECT:
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“xxlegitxx”]Dude, that’s so true.[/quote]

Yea, he is pretty leet.[/td][/tr][/table]

[size=12pt]The third step is to fix the white space.[/size] Do not leave unnecessary white space between the begin quote and the quoted text, or between the quoted text and the end quote. Also, add a space between the end quote and your post.

WRONG!
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“xxlegitxx”]I <3 xxlegitxx.[/quote]
Truth.[/td][/tr][/table]

WRONG AGAIN!
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“xxlegitxx”]I <3 xxlegitxx.[/quote]
Truth.[/td][/tr][/table]

FINALLY YOU GOT IT RIGHT, DIPSHIT!
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“xxlegitxx”]I <3 xxlegitxx.[/quote]

Truth.[/td][/tr][/table]

[size=12pt]The fourth step is to use more quotes.[/size] If you make a good point, but don’t quote who you are responding to, you just wasted your time. Short quotes never hurt anybody, and it certainly helps avoid unnecessary flame wars based on a miscontrued post.

WRONG!
[table][tr][td][/td][td]You’re a retard.[/td][/tr][/table]

RIGHT:
[table][tr][td][/td][td][quote=“true mager, post:54, topic:136412”]trying it on “str” lol[/quote]

You’re a retard.[/td][/tr][/table]

[size=12pt]The fifth and final step to quoting is to stick a fork up your ass.[/size] So I don’t get banned, I won’t provide an example, but just remember: Prongs end first!

EDIT: I can’t count.

Read full topic
